Arshia Agrawal

Human Resource Manager

The job of management is not to select the best ideas, it is to create a system that allows for the best ideas to emerge. Keeping this in mind, with her keen interest in management, she brings out perfection in people around her. That being said, she is also an avid reader and a trained singer. When she isn't working, you'll find her scrounging through the kitchen like a goblin. Her mantra : Stay Hungry, Stay Foolish! ✌️
